modification.name: Ranked Quickstats Tooltips
modification.description: Enables quickstat tooltips to display current season ranked data when moused-over. This is reminiscent of the old main interface game_lobby UI.
modification.author: MrHappyAsthma

function Player_Stats_V2:FetchSeasonNormalRecentMatchData(nickName) if nickName ~= nil then println('^gPlayer_Stats_V2:FetchSeasonNormalRecentMatchData() called with name: '..nickName) else println('^gPlayer_Stats_V2:FetchSeasonNormalRecentMatchData() called with name: nil') end -- Issue the form submission to fetch the most recent 7 matches. This triggers `PlayerStatsMatchListResult` trigger. SubmitForm('PlayerStatsMatchList', 'f', 'match_history_overview', 'nickname', StripClanTag(nickName), 'cookie', Client.GetCookie(), 'table', 'campaign' , 'num', '7', 'current_season', '1') end
function Player_Stats_V2:QuickStatsMod_OnPlayerStatsMatchListResult(index) local numMatches = math.min(7, #_matchList) local output = '' for i=1, numMatches do local match = _matchList[i]
local heroname = string.lower(string.sub(match['heroname'], 6, -1)) local iconPath = GetHeroIconPath(heroname)
local result = '^522Lose' if match['result'] == '1' then result = '^884Win' end
local KDA = '^g'..match['kills']..'^*/^r'..match['deaths']..'^*/^y'..match['assists']
output = output .. iconPath .. '^*:' .. result .. '^*:' .. KDA if i ~= numMatches then output = output .. '^*|' end end Set('QuickstatsMod_stats_tipMatch' .. index, output) end

function Player_Stats_V2:FetchSeasonNormalData(nickName) _currentNickName = nickName
if nickName ~= nil then println('^gPlayer_Stats_V2:FetchSeasonNormalData() called with name: '..nickName) else println('^gPlayer_Stats_V2:FetchSeasonNormalData() called with name: nil') end
-- Probably overkill, but it triggers InitOverviewRankTypes(). Player_Stats_V2:ResetUI()
-- Actually trigger the fetch by submitting the forms. Again this is -- overkill but it does trigger `PlayerStatsNormalSeasonResult`. SubmitInitialForms() end
